price: 15. Dis : « Je crains, en désobéissant à mon Seigneur, d’être voué au supplice d’un jour terrible. »
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
